      • execXQuery

        public java.lang.Object execXQuery​(java.lang.String query,
                                   net.sf.saxon.s9api.XdmItem context,
                                   java.util.Map<net.sf.saxon.s9api.QName,​net.sf.saxon.s9api.XdmItem> bindings,
                                   java.lang.String outputType)
                            throws net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException
        Throws:
        net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException

      • xquery

        public java.lang.Object xquery​(java.lang.String query,
                               java.lang.String contextFile,
                               java.lang.String... params)
                        throws net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException
        Parameters:
        query - The query, possibly containing binding definitions
        contextFile - An XML file's path which will be loaded as context of the query or, if none provided, the constant Saxon.XQUERY_NO_CONTEXT.
        params - Variable bindings and output type in a new-line separated String. Each line is expected to contain a binding definition in the form varName = value as type, the optional output definition in the form Saxon.XQUERY_OUTPUT as type. The standard output type is DOM, denoted by Saxon.NODE.
        Returns:
        Result of the query, this can be a list of the basic types String, Integer, Boolean, or an XML DOM
        Throws:
        net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException - If the query is not a valid XQuery or the input does not match the expected types

      • xquery
